links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (9,4)
mathematica: Join[{a=0,b=1},Table[c=9*b+4*a;a=b;b=c,{n,60}]] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jan 27 2011 *)LinearRecurrence[{9, 4}, {0, 1}, 30] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 14 2012 *)
prog: (Sage) [lucas_number1(n,9,-4) for n in xrange(0, 19)] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 26 2009(MAGMA) [n le 2 select n-1 else 9*Self(n-1) + 4*Self(n-2): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 14 2012
